title: K-Means Image Compression Web App
description: Built a web-based image compression tool using unsupervised learning to reduce image size while preserving visual quality.
fullDescription: This project implements an intelligent image compression system using MiniBatch K-Means clustering in LAB color space. It automatically selects optimal compression parameters using Shannon entropy and spatial variance, achieving 50â€“60% file size reduction without deep learning. The system is deployed as a Flask web app with real-time upload, compression, and download support.

title: Dish Success Prediction System
description: Developed an end-to-end machine learning system to predict whether a restaurant dish will be successful, average, or unsuccessful.
fullDescription: This project models dish performance as a multi-class classification problem using Logistic Regression with a full preprocessing pipeline. It supports numeric and categorical features, custom dataset uploads, real-time model training, and probability-based predictions. The system is deployed as an interactive Flask web app with a clean UI and dataset validation logic.

title: Stock Market Prediction & Accuracy Tracker
description: Created a stock market prediction web app that forecasts next-day prices and tracks real-world prediction accuracy over time.
fullDescription: This Flask-based application fetches historical stock data from Yahoo Finance and trains Linear Regression models per ticker. It predicts next-day prices, logs predictions, evaluates them against actual market data, and computes detailed error metrics. The app includes daily caching, automated model cleanup, and a full accuracy analytics dashboard.
